values.content:
=Extract the following information from the text
here:{{ $json.chatInput }}
- Industry
- Location
- Business 

If I type in "Find restaurants in Dubai", the following should be the results.
Use this same logic.
Industry: Cafes and restaurants
Location: Location
Business type: restaurants
Return the result as a JSON object in this form
{
  "Industry": "cafes and restaurants",
  "Location": "Dubai",
  "Business": "restaurant"
}

You are to determine the industry from these seven options:
-fashion brands
-cafes & restaurants
-hotels & stays 
-beauty, skincare & wellness 
-media companies
-production houses & creative studios
-lifestyle & D2C brands

assignments.name: searchquery
assignments.value:
=("{{ $json.message.content.Business }} in {{ $json.message.content.Location }}") 
AND 
("@gmail.com" OR "@yahoo.com" OR "@hotmail.com" OR "@outlook.com" OR "@icloud.com" OR "@info.com")
